announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 4th January, 2026. Offertory will be led by Sacred Heart of Jesus Christ and the Sunday borns respectively. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Epiphany of the Lord

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Parish 2026 calendars are available for purchase. Any additional revenue generated beyond the cost from this year's sales will go directly into donations towards the needy
announcements.title: 2026 Calendar Sales

announcements.details: Parents and guardians with wards in boarding and tertiary schools are encouraged to submit their details to members of the Formation Team or the Youth Council.
announcements.title: School Visitation Project
